players.name: Bob
memory: The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Charlie: "Bob, you may have mistaken your investigation. I didn't kill Alice. Vote for Diana."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie—Bob killed Alice. Vote Bob."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be mafia. He killed Alice. Vote him."
